description: Astronomers have detected a remarkable wobble in the orbit of a star being torn apart by a black hole, offering one of the clearest confirmations yet of Einstein’s frame-dragging effect. By tracking repeating X-ray and radio signals every 20 days, researchers captured spacetime twisting around a rapidly spinning black hole—revealing powerful insights into extreme gravity.
title: Astronomers Observe Star’s Wobbling Orbit, Confirming Einstein’s Frame-Dragging

description: Blue Origin’s upcoming NS-37 mission marks a historic first: sending aerospace engineer Michaela “Michi” Benthaus, a wheelchair user, into space aboard New Shepard. Scheduled for Dec. 18, the flight will take six passengers past the Kármán line for a few minutes of weightlessness, highlighting growing accessibility and inclusion in private spaceflight.
title: Blue Origin to Fly First Wheelchair User to Space on New Shepard NS-37

description: NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory has released stunning colour-coded galaxy cluster images that reveal shock waves, cooling gas, and cavities carved by supermassive black holes. By separating X-ray light into different energy bands, astronomers can now visualise hidden cosmic processes that shape the universe’s largest structures and control how galaxies grow over billions of years.
title: Chandra’s New X-Ray Mapping Exposes the Invisible Engines Powering Galaxy Clusters

description: NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory has released stunning colour-coded galaxy cluster images that reveal shock waves, cooling gas, and cavities carved by supermassive black holes. By separating X-ray light into different energy bands, astronomers can now visualise hidden cosmic processes that shape the universe’s largest structures and control how galaxies grow over billions of years.
title: Chandra’s New X-Ray Mapping Exposes the Invisible Engines Powering Galaxy Clusters

description: Astronomers using ESA’s Euclid telescope and AI analysis have found that merging galaxies are significantly more likely to host active supermassive black holes. The gravitational chaos of a collision drives gas toward the galactic core, igniting AGN activity. This discovery strengthens the link between galaxy interactions and the energetic processes that shape galactic evolution.
title: Galaxy Collisions Found to Activate Supermassive Black Holes, Euclid Data Shows

description: Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have detected the oldest supernova ever recorded, tied to gamma-ray burst GRB 250314A. Occurring when the universe was only 730 million years old, the explosion provides a rare glimpse into the first generations of stars and early galaxy growth, highlighting Webb’s unmatched ability to study the distant cosmos.
title: JWST Detects Oldest Supernova Ever Seen, Linked to GRB 250314A

description: Sasivadane is receiving increased attention on OTT after landing on Amazon Prime. With its scenic Godavari backdrop, tender romance and emotional twists, the film has caught the interest of Telugu movie lovers.
title: Sasivadane Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know

description: Starring Pasupathy in the key role, Kuttram Purindhavan is a Tamil crime thriller series that revolves around a retired pharmacist, who gets stuck between innocence and guilt while hiding a secret.
title: Kuttram Purindhavan Now Streaming Online: What You Need to Know?

description: The Motorola Edge 70 is all set to be launched in India as the first member of the Edge 70 family. Arriving as the successor to the Edge 60, several details about the handset have been teased ahead of its official debut. Here is everything we know about the Motorola Edge 70, including its expected price in India, features, and specifications.
title: Motorola Edge 70: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More

description: Lyne Lancer 19 Pro smartwatch has been launched in India. It provides heart rate monitoring and blood-oxygen saturation (SpO2) tracking. The wearable has a 2.01-inch touch display and supports Bluetooth 5.3 calling. The Lyne Lancer 19 Pro has a 210mAh battery that is advertised to support three to four days of battery life on moderate usage with Bluetooth calling.
title: Lyne Lancer 19 Pro With 2.01-Inch Display, SpO2 Monitoring Launched in India

description: Permanent Account Number (PAN) Card is issued by the Income Tax (IT) Department, which comes under the aegis of the Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT). While there is no minimum age requirement to apply for a PAN Card, you do need to present multiple documents to initiate the process. The IT Department requires you to present a valid proof of identity, such as a voter ID card, a document validating your age, and one to verify your address. There are various government portals through which you can apply for a PAN Card.
title: PAN Card Apply Online: How To Apply For PAN Card Online via Different Methods

description: Here are the five best smartphones priced under Rs. 30,000 that deliver AMOLED displays alongside other future-ready features. The list includes models like iQOO Neo 10R 5G, Samsung Galaxy A17 5G, Vivo T4 Pro, Realme 15T, and Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G. These are some of the best smartphones in India with AMOLED screens that cost less than Rs. 30,000.
title: Best AMOLED Display Phones Under 30,000: iQOO Neo 10R 5G, Galaxy A17 5G, and More

description: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra, which is expected to succeed the 2024-launched Edge 50 Ultra, could be the second handset in the Edge 70 lineup. Recently, the renders of the handset were leaked, revealing its design and colourways. Now, a tipster has shared various key specifications and features of the phone, including its chipset, camera configuration, and display. The Edge 70 Ultra is tipped to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset. It might also carry a triple 50-megapixel rear camera setup.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Ultra Key Specifications, Colourways Tipped; Might Launch With 50-Megapixel Camera

description: OpenAI and Disney have signed a three-year deal that lets Sora and ChatGPT generate short AI-made videos and images featuring more than 200 Disney, Marvel, Pixar and Star Wars characters. Users will be able to create clips with icons such as Mickey Mouse, Ariel, Simba, Iron Man and Darth Vader, although actor likenesses and original voices are not included. Disney will also invest $1 billion in OpenAI and use its APIs to build new products and Disney+ features.
title: OpenAI and Disney Reach Licensing Agreement to Bring Its Characters to the Sora App

description: Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini will launch on December 15. Now the handsets have reportedly been spotted on the China Telecom website just a few days ahead of their launch. The listing reveals its key specifications. The Vivo S50 could come with a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset and a 6.59-inch display. The Vivo S50 Pro Mini will run on the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset.
title: Vivo S50 and Vivo S50 Pro Mini Spotted on China Telecom Website Ahead of December 15 Launch

description: Amazon will invest more than $35 billion in India by 2030, focusing on AI adoption, exports and job creation. The company says the plan will help 15 million small businesses use AI tools, boost India’s ecommerce exports to $80 billion and support 3.8 million jobs. Amazon will also expand fulfilment and data centre infrastructure and offer AI education to four million students, strengthening its long-term presence in the country.
title: Amazon Joins Google and Microsoft With a Massive $35 Billion Bet on India’s AI Growth

description: Apple is expected to unveil new AirTag and HomePod mini next year. Details about their features were reportedly discovered in the internal build of iOS 26. The AirTag 2 is likely to offer a faster pairing process and detailed battery level reporting. The new HomePod mini is said to use Apple’s S10 chip. It is said to be in development with the codename B252 and is unlikely to support Apple Intelligence features.
title: Apple's Upgraded AirTag to Offer Improved Tracking Features; HomePod Mini to Feature New Chip: Report

description: Bitcoin traded around $92,280 (roughly Rs. 83.3 lakh) on Friday as crypto markets recovered modestly, supported by stronger risk appetite, stabilising ETF flows and improving regulatory clarity. Ethereum and major altcoins also gained, though analysts say liquidity remains thin and macro uncertainty persists. Key levels for Bitcoin remain $90,000 on the downside and $93,500 on the upside.
title: Bitcoin Rises Above $92,300 as Crypto Market Stabilises Ahead of Weekend Trade

description: Mammootty returns as detective Dominic in Dominic and the Ladies Purse, a crime comedy filled with mystery, humour, and twists. After months of OTT delay, the film finally premieres on ZEE5 on December 19, 2025, earning attention with its 7.0/10 IMDb rating.
title: Dominic and the Ladies' Purse OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Fortnite has returned to the Google Play Store in the US, Epic Games announced on Friday. This marks the culmination of a five-year legal battle, which began in 2020, when Epic Games filed a lawsuit against Apple and Google for their allegedly unfair and anti-competitive platform rules. While the multiplayer game returned to the App Store in May, Google's pending appeal against the 2023 judgement led to its delayed return to the Play Store.
title: Fortnite Returns to Google Play Store After Extended Legal Battle

description: Kesariya at 100 S1 takes viewers through a century-long story of discipline, service, and ideology as it traces the growth of the RSS. Hosted by Dr. Nitish Bharadwaj and newly released on ZEE5, the series explores the organisation’s cultural impact and historical legacy. IMDb rating will be updated once more viewers submit reviews.
title: Kesariya at 100 Season 1 Now Streaming on  ZEE5: When and Where to Watch Docuseries Online?

description: Meta India announced the appointment of Aman Jain as its new head of Public Policy on Friday. As per the company, Jain will take charge early next year and report directly to Simon Milner, Vice President of Policy for Asia Pacific (APAC) at Meta. The new executive will also join Meta’s India leadership team, which oversees the company’s strategy across platforms, including social media apps like Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.
title: Meta India Appoints Amazon Executive Aman Jain as New Head of Public Policy in 2026

description: Saali Mohabbat brings a tense and emotional story of betrayal and danger, featuring Radhika Apte in a gripping role. With Tisca Chopra making a strong directorial debut, the film blends psychological depth with unexpected twists. Now streaming on ZEE5, the thriller has already earned an IMDb rating of 8.0/10 and is gaining strong early reactions from viewers.
title: Radhika Apte’s New Psychological Thriller Saali Mohabbat Now Streaming on ZEE5

description: Realme Narzo 90 series, which will be launched in India in the third week of December, will succeed the Narzo 80 lineup. The upcoming Narzo 90 5G and Narzo 90x 5G are confirmed to be available in the country via an e-commerce platform and the company’s website. While the tech firm has been teasing the key specifications of the two phones, their price in India is yet to be revealed. However, now, the same has surfaced online. Additionally, the tech firm has confirmed the colourways of the two handsets.
title: Realme Narzo 90 Series Price in India Leaked; Company Reveals Colourways Ahead of December 16 Launch

description: Samsung is said to be developing a new image sensor that will be implemented on its next-generation flagships. According to a report, it may be capable of global shutter-level shooting by incorporating a new pixel structure and algorithms on existing rolling shutter hardware. This could potentially result in better images of fast-moving objects and reduced subject warping compared to the rolling shutters, which are used in most flagship smartphones today.
title: Samsung's Global Shutter-Level Image Sensor Could Arrive on Future Flagship Galaxy Smartphones: Report

description: The Rookie Season 7 is generating massive excitement as fans await its Netflix release on January 8, 2026. The trailer showcases high-intensity action and emotional depth, while early buzz highlights the show's strong IMDb rating of 8/10.
title: The Rookie Season 7 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The Game Awards 2025 featured several major announcements and reveals, including two new Tomb Raider games, two new Star Wars games, and Divinity — the next game from Larian Studios. There were several updates on already announced titles and a few major surprises. Here's everything announced at The Game Awards 2025.
title: Tomb Raider Catalyst, Divinity, Star Wars Fate of the Old Republic: Everything Announced at The Game Awards

description: Meta India has appointed Aman Jain as its new Head of Public Policy. He will begin early next year, reporting to APAC policy chief Simon Milner and joining Meta’s India leadership team. Jain is a seasoned public policy professional with experience at Google, Amazon and government agencies. His move comes after a two-year stint at Amazon, where he led public policy. Jain says Meta’s role in India’s digital and creator ecosystem strongly aligns with his interests.
title: Who Is Aman Jain? The Industry Veteran Who Will Shape Meta’s Public Policies in India

description: Honor X8d will be launched in select global markets with a 7,000mAh battery and 4G LTE connectivity, according to the phone's listing on an online retailer's platform in Kyrgyzstan. The handset is shown with a dual rear camera unit, which could be headlined by a 108-megapixel primary shooter and a 5-megapixel secondary camera. On the front, it could ship with a 16-megapixel selfie camera, housed inside a hole punch display cutout. It is listed with a 6.77-inch AMOLED display, too.
title: Honor X8d Listed on Retailer's Website With 7,000mAh Battery, 108-Megapixel Camera; Could Launch Soon

description: A week after the code red declaration, OpenAI has released its second update for the GPT-5 series, dubbed GPT-5.2. This family of AI models targets the enterprise workers with major upgrade to “economically valuable tasks.” The improvements are across the board, and the company also claims that in certain benchmarks, it outperformed Google’s Gemini 3 Pro, which caused the code red in the first place.
title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5.2 AI Models with Enterprise-Focused Upgrades, Takes on Gemini 3 Pro

description: Samsung Galaxy A07 5G have surfaced online via the Bluetooth SIG website. The listing shows the phone with model numbers SM-A076B/DS, SM-A076M/DS and SM-A076M. Additionally, regional support pages for the smartphone are currently live, suggesting that the global launch of the phone could be right around the corner. Samsung Galaxy A07 4G variant was launched in India in October this year.
title: Samsung Galaxy A07 5G Spotted on Bluetooth SIG Website; New Support Pages Hint at Upcoming Launch

description: The Vivo V70 series is rumoured to be in development as the successor to the Vivo V60 series. According to a recent leak by a tipster, the lineup will include four models. Most of them may be reserved for the global markets, with only the standard Vivo V70 expected to make its way to India. The tipster also revealed that the Vivo V70 lineup will not include Pro or Pro Plus models.
title: Vivo V70 Elite, V70 FE Also in Development; Global Markets Won't Get Pro Models, Tipster Claims

description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 swept The Game Awards 2025 on Friday, winning Game of the Year and eight other prizes. The debut game from French indie studio Sandfall Interactive also won Best Game Direction, Best Narrative, Best Art Direction, Best Performance, Best Score and Music, wrapping up all the major awards on the night. Here's the full list of winners.
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Wins Game of the Year, Sweeps The Game Awards 2025 With 9 Wins: Full Winners' List

description: Hogwarts Legacy is now available for free on the Epic Games Store on PC, Geoff Keighley announced at The Game Awards 2025 on Friday. The action-adventure game can be redeemed for free on the Epic Games Store launched on PC till December 18.
title: Hogwarts Legacy Is Now Available for Free on PC via Epic Games Store: How to Redeem

description: Apple will reportedly launch the new AI-powered Siri in Spring next year, according to an internal code spotted in a leaked iOS build. If this is true, then the Cupertino-based tech giant will release the updated version of its voice assistant nearly two years after its initial unveiling during the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) in 2024. Apart from iPhone, iPad, and MacBook models, the new Siri version is said to also arrive on the company's smart home devices, like the rumoured HomePod.
title: iOS 26 Code Reportedly Reveals When Apple's Revamped Siri Could Launch Alongside Compatible HomePod

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra charging specifications have surfaced online. The device has now been spotted on China's 3C certification website, revealing some details about its charging details. The upcoming model could offer 60W charging speed. This would be a significant upgrade over previous Ultra models, which have been limited to 45W charging speed.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Reportedly Bags 3C Certification; Could Offer Long-Awaited Charging Upgrade

description: Huawei Mate X7 has been launched in global markets. It runs on HarmonyOS 6.0 and features an 8-inch flexible LTPO OLED inner screen and a 6.49-inch cover screen. It runs on a Kirin 9030 Pro chipset, paired with 16GB RAM and 512GB of onboard storage. It has a triple outward-facing camera unit headlined by a 50-megapixel primary RYYB camera
title: Huawei Mate X7 With Kirin 9030 Pro Chip, 8-Inch OLED Inner Display Launched Globally: Price, Specifications

description: WhatsApp announced a slew of new features for its app on Thursday ahead of the holiday season. According to the Meta-owned instant messaging platform, its new Missed Call Messages feature is a replacement for traditional voicemail and is designed to make it easier to catch up with loved ones. Image creation with Meta AI is also said to have received upgrades, including the ability to animate images into short videos and improved generation quality.
title: WhatsApp Announces Voicemail-Like Missed Call Messages, Image Animation and More Features

description: Nothing recently launched the Phone 3a Community Edition in India and the global markets. The Carl Pei-led smartphone brand is said to have now shifted its focus to its succeeding lineup. According to a recent leak, the Nothing Phone 4a and Phone 4a Pro could be powered by Snapdragon 7 series chipsets. The purported handsets may be introduced in four colourways, and only one of them is expected to come with support for eSIM.
title: Nothing Phone 4a, 4a Price Key Specs and Price Tipped; Nothing Headphone a in Development
